example\_1\_full\_stack.description: Collapse a full δ→…→ρ operator stack to Ξ(B).
example\_1\_full\_stack.expression: E \= ρ ∘ χ ∘ Θ ∘ ψ ∘ λ ∘ μ ∘ Π ∘ Φ ∘ δ
notes: Assume B is the underlying Box object.
All lower-tier normalizations are implicitly applied before Ξ-\>NF.

example\_2\_global\_layered.description: Apply Ω and ρ before Ξ-\>NF.
example\_2\_global\_layered.interpretation: Globally constrained and layer-structured state, then collapsed to Ξ(B).

example\_3\_tensor\_synthesis.expression: Ξ⊗(T\_δ, T\_Φ, T\_ψ) where T\_δ∈Tensor(δ), T\_Φ∈Tensor(Φ), T\_ψ∈Tensor(ψ)
example\_3\_tensor\_synthesis.interpretation: A single Ξ-tensor carrying deviation, projection, and wave content in a unified object.
